Board Meeting Scheduled:The Board of Directors of Persistent Systems will meet on July 23, 2025, to consider and approve the issuance of equity shares to the PSPL ESOP Management Trust.

Google Cloud Recognition:Persistent Systems received the 2025 Google Cloud Infrastructure Modernization Partner of the Year Award for Asia Pacific,according to Business Standardand thePersistent Systems website. This recognition highlights the company's success in helping businesses migrate and optimize their operations on Google Cloud through large-scale migrations and cloud-native solutions.
